mnd8:21.4: āveṭhiyaṃ → āvedhiyaṃ (s1-3, pts1), nibbeṭhiyaṃ → nibbedhiyaṃ (s1-3, pts1, mr)
mnd8:26.2: pañhavimaṃsakāse → pañhavīmaṃsakā se (bj) | pañhavimaṃsakā ye (s1-3, pts1)
mnd8:29.4: bhañjissāmī”ti, yā evarūpā → yo evarūpo (s1-3, pts1)
mnd8:35.2: unnatiyā → uṇṇatiyā (s1-3, pts1, mr), onatiyā → oṇatiyā (s1-3, pts1, mr)
mnd8:40.3: So → so taṃ (bj), unnamatī ca → uṇṇamaticca (bj, s1-3, pts1) | uṇṇamatī ca (mr)
